resources.string: Brought to you by \n eSquared technologies

The Rules are simple: You and your significant other, your family, or your friends need to find somewhere to eat and no one is doing a good job of picking a place. Restaurant Roulette is your solution. Each member of your group agrees to let a spin of the restaurant wheel decide where you eat tonight. Restaurant will search restaurants in your area and return a randomly chosen option. Enjoy your meal and hopefully find a new favorite.
